item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
For some time now, I've been wanting to start a blog. I hope to find time and energy to keep posting.

This blog has one main objective, which is to consolidate my knowledge through writing. One of the tests to see if I understood something is whether I can explain it to someone else.

Feedback is appreciated.
